data.prayer: Father, convict the 7,148 believers in Lai Châu to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lai Châu, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Lai Châu, Vietnam and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 56 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Lai Châu, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Lai Châu, Vietnam to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Lai Châu, Vietnam to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Akha people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Lai Châu, Vietnam will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Lai Châu, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Lai Châu, Vietnam to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Lai Châu
